DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this survey is to describe long-term tolerance as seen under current conditions of use for anastrozole.
DOC.brief_title: Survey in Post-menopausal Women Followed up After Treatment With Anastrozole as Adjuvant Therapy
DOC.criteria: woman treated with anastrozole as adjuvant therapy for hormonedependant breast cancer in postmenopausal women with positive hormonereceptors
